topic.title: What happened to Maelstrom?
topic.body:
I went to down load the Maelstrom browser to try it out and I get the message:
"No matching rule"

Anyone know what happened to the project?  I've already tried searching various keywords but haven't been able to find out what became of it.

topic.title: David Ickeâ€™s Friend, Zen Gardner, Confesses He Ran Pedophile Cult

1_1Dj5WCaPV2r18QcDQFHmyx2HnGmwMJce9b.body:
That's just communist nonsense.  
What men need to do, and some already do so, is either find ways to generate electricity or go without.  For six thousand years man did not use electricity.  It is not the "end-all-be-all."
And if a man is not willing to purify water for his family, or find clean water then he is not noble or decent.

1_1B6K3CdEdkDqn2vbe4sURDAGMV1xeFpf3t.body:
I found the download file while surfing on the phone, i downloaded it and then transferred to my pc.  I think Maelstrom concept is good.  \
I still have questions about Zeronet though and wish that I could get answers.  I don't know how to upload a website, or mirror a website or any of that.. 

What would be cool is an answer and a way to do it so that I don't just throw up my hands and say "forget it".
